title: [GAMEPLAY] Vi's q in Cass's w
body:
Because Cass's w causes the grounded debuff, it's natural that Vi can't use her q in it. But, if you start charging her q and walk into Miasma, you will lose the indicator that shows how far Vi will go, but keep charging. I use quick-cast, so i don't know how it reacts with regular casting, but you will keep charging even if you take your hand off of the q button, and pressing it again will cause you to dash towards your mouse.
1. Charge Vault Breaker.
2. Walk into Miasma.

replies.body: only the first part is coded as a dash, its two separate abilities with different coding, the second one will go off no matter what unless you are rooted, stunned or knocked up.
